video.title: Power Rangers Super Megaforce
video.synopsis: Armed with a key that allows them to morph into any team of Legendary Rangers from the past, the Super Megaforce Rangers fight ruthless Prince Vekar.

episodes.synopsis: Gosei gives the Rangers new Morphers which unlock a Super Mega Mode that allows the Rangers to access the forces of previous Power Rangers.
episodes.title: Super Megaforce

episodes.synopsis: As the team helps civilians rebuild their city, Troy discovers a plot by the Armada to attack major cities around the world.
episodes.title: Earth Fights Back

episodes.synopsis: After a master swordsman monster humiliates him in battle, Noah suffers a crisis of confidence and questions his worth as a Ranger.
episodes.title: Blue Saber Saga

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers head to a mystical airborne island in search of the wild yet powerful Red Lion Zord, unaware they are being followed by the Armada.
episodes.title: A Lion’s Alliance

episodes.synopsis: When the emperor sends a powerful monster to attack the Rangers, help comes from a mysterious Samurai visitor.
episodes.title: Samurai Surprise

episodes.synopsis: To battle a monster that can take their weapons away, Jake and Emma seek the help of a zoo keeper to channel their personal animal spirits.
episodes.title: Spirit of the Tiger

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers discover the presence of a new Silver Ranger and question whether he's an ally or a foe.
episodes.title: Silver Lining: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Orion, the Silver Ranger, explains his past and how he obtained the Silver Ranger Key, the Rangers discover he may have amazing powers.
episodes.title: Silver Lining: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jake must put aside his jealousy of Orion and help him use the combined power of the Sixth Rangers to defeat an energy-sucking monster.
episodes.title: Power of Six

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers' fight against an invading monster gets sidetracked when Tensou is struck by lightning, develops amnesia and leaves the Command Center.
episodes.title: The Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: When a love potion accidentally makes the evil Levira fall in love with Jake, a jealous alien targets him for destruction.
episodes.title: Love Is in the Air

episodes.synopsis: When the Megazord is damaged, Emma uses unconventional methods to defeat a monster who steals humans' happiness.
episodes.title: United as One

episodes.synopsis: A body-swapping monster named Tranceferer switches Jake and Noah so that they are inhabiting each other's bodies.
episodes.title: The Grass Is Always Greener…or Bluer

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers are trapped in the alternate dimension by Professor Cog, who attacks Earth in their absence.
episodes.title: In the Driver’s Seat

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers finally battle the evil Prince Vekar face-to-face when he comes to Earth armed with his very own Megazord.
episodes.title: All Hail Prince Vekar

episodes.synopsis: After defeating Prince Vekar, the Rangers must face Vrak, who returns with a powerful new robot and a plan to destroy the world.
episodes.title: Vrak Is Back: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Orion kidnapped and Robo Knight turned against them, the Megaforce Rangers must do everything they can to defeat Vrak and save their friends.
episodes.title: Vrak Is Back: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Emperor Mavro captures the Red Ranger and uses him as a bargaining chip to force Earth to surrender to the Armada.
episodes.title: Emperor Mavro

episodes.synopsis: Just when the Rangers thought they'd saved the planet, the Emperor launches a massive attack on Earth.
episodes.title: The Wrath

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers team up with the Legendary Rangers from the past and fight to save Earth from the Emperor's massive attack.
episodes.title: Legendary Battle
